name: The Floor Is Lava (itch)
description:
Rocketjumpy thingy game.

Uploaded for AGDG DemoDay.

Contains a tutorial and two playable levels.

Testers claim it's super hard, don't give up!

  • The direction you look in matters
  • How fast you thrust after jumping matters
  • Check your cooldowns, you might have enough upgrades to stay in air indefinitely!
